original_text:
May grain abound throughout the land;
    on the tops of the hills may it sway.
May the crops flourish like Lebanon
    and thrive like the grass of the field.
korean_text: 산 꼭대기의 땅에도 곡식이 풍성하고 그것의 열매가 레바논 같이 흔들리며 성에 있는 자가 땅의 풀 같이 왕성하리로다

sentences.original_text: May grain abound throughout the land;
on the tops of the hills may it sway.
May the crops flourish like Lebanon
and thrive like the grass of the field.
